docs.text: Comandante/SQLite An add-on for Comandante to simplify working with sqlite . Installation Add the dependency to your shard.yml : dependencies: comandante-sqlite: github: tghaleb/comandante-sqlite Run shards install Usage require "comandante-sqlite" This is actually a wrapper around sqlite . To setup a database, db = SQLite.new(path_to_db) db.create_table(TBL_SQL) db.close class Comandante::SQLite inherits Reference Constructors .new ( file = "" ) Will automatically close db on exit or finalize.
